trends: There have been 106 other sightings in Colorado Springs
There were no other sightings in Colorado Springs on or around August 24th 2012
Summary: was awake and saw a ball of light
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsI was wide awake after doing algibra 2 and American lit home work and was having a hard time sleeping but heard the weird sound i hear every now and then but some thing was different this time. it came from the side of my house then stoped on my window. it was quiet for about 5 - 3 seconds and i closed my eyes and opened them again and there was a bright ball or circle out side my window but infront of my trees in my back yard. i live on a hill where absolutly NO cars or trains can light up my room. it was hovering for a second or so and then performed a perfect angle to a 90 degrees up and out of sight. this is the only sighting that actualy scares me. i fear those things and hope i can take my mind off of it. after the ivestigation.
